hibernate-mapping.query: select new edu.ur.ir.item.ContentTypeCount (contentType, count(contentType.id)) from InstitutionalItem as institutionalItem, ContentType as contentType where institutionalItem.institutionalCollection.repository.id = :repositoryId and ( institutionalItem.versionedInstitutionalItem.currentVersion.item.primaryContentType.id = contentType.id or institutionalItem.versionedInstitutionalItem.currentVersion.item.id = ( select item.id from GenericItem as item join item.secondaryContentTypes as secondaryContentType where secondaryContentType.id = contentType.id and item.id = institutionalItem.versionedInstitutionalItem.currentVersion.item.id ) ) group by contentType.id
